com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.attribute

Class FullDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.attribute.FullDouble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class FullDouble
extends Number
    Helper class to be used when wanting to store the full value spectrum of a double value. By default, Titan will convert double values into a decimal format so that it can be stored in byte-order and be used for vertex-centric indices. However, that restricts the value spectrum of doubles when registered using TypeMaker.dataType(Class) with Double.class as argument. When order preservation is not important, use FullDouble as the data type.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
    See Also:
